name: Furry Gainer RPG
description:
Hey there, thanks for checking out my project.

Furry Gainer RPG (Better name pending) is a visual novel that contains furry and weight-gain content. It's in very early development at the moment, but will receive regular updates and improvements as time goes on.

All criticism is appreciated. The comments are open at the bottom of the page & I will do my best to respond to any messages.

Thank you!
